snippet: The $978 million acquisition of BR Towers, backed by the private equity firm GP Investments, follows American Tower’s purchase last year of 2,800 cellphone towers in Brazi.
abstract: The $978 million acquisition of BR Towers, backed by the private equity firm GP Investments, follows American Tower’s purchase last year of 2,800 cellphone towers in Brazi.

headline.main: American Tower Expands Cellphone Tower Holdings in Brazil
